title: College Board Unveils Environment Context Dashboard, Trade Tariffs Hurt Investors, Reigniting Startups
itunes:title: College Board Unveils Environment Context Dashboard, Trade Tariffs Hurt Investors, Reigniting Startups
description:
David Coleman, CEO of the College Board, discusses the Environment Context Dashboard which adds an `adversity score’ to the SAT to take student hardships into account. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Mike Regan, Senior Editor of Bloomberg Markets Live Blog, explain how investors who priced in the trade war are bracing for a bruising fight. Bloomberg News Bond Reporter Alex Harris and Bloomberg Economics Senior U.S. Economist Yelena Shulyatyeva break down today’s bond market and eco news. Craig Hall, Founder of the Hall Group, says a lack of capital is preventing entrepreneurs from starting businesses. His book is called "Boom: Bridging the Opportunity Gap to Reignite Startups.” And we Drive to the Close with Doug Ciocca CEO at Kavar Capital. 

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly.  Producer: Paul Brennan 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
